New Records: Jordan Poole topped 25 points for a fifth straight game, the first such stretch of his career.
Key Match Events: The Wizards beat the Chicago Bulls 125-107 on Wednesday night.
Post-Match Reflections: Poole — who joined Washington from Golden State prior to the 2023-24 season — made six 3-pointers.
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was a game between the Washington Wizards and the Chicago Bulls on January 1, 2025.
Others: The Wizards won the game with a score of 125-107.
